stotras.name: Shiva Panchakshari Stotram
stotras.author: Adi Shankaracharya
stotras.summary: A hymn glorifying each syllable of 'Na-Ma-Shi-Va-Ya', representing the five elements and the cosmic form of Shiva.
stotras.benefits: Removes fear, grants purity of mind, devotion, and grace of Shiva.

stotras.name: Shiv Tandav Stotram
stotras.author: Ravana
stotras.summary: Describes the cosmic dance of Shiva, the power of creation, destruction, rhythm, and divine energy.
stotras.benefits: Destroys negativity, grants strength, success, and inner power.

stotras.name: Lingashtakam
stotras.author: Unknown (Traditional)
stotras.summary: Praises the Shiva Linga as the symbol of cosmic creation, dissolution, and divine consciousness.

stotras.name: Rudrashtakam
stotras.author: Tulsidas
stotras.summary: Poetic prayer describing Shiva’s serene and fierce forms, expressing surrender and devotion.
stotras.benefits: Destroys sins, brings peace and divine protection.

stotras.name: Bilvashtakam
stotras.author: Adi Shankaracharya
stotras.summary: Describes the spiritual significance of offering Bilva leaves to Lord Shiva.
stotras.benefits: Equivalent to performing numerous yajñas; fulfills wishes.

stotras.name: Maha Mrityunjaya Mantra
stotras.author: Rig Veda (Traditional)
stotras.summary: A powerful Vedic mantra for healing, protection, and overcoming fear of death.
stotras.benefits: Removes disease, accidents, and bestows longevity.

stotras.name: Shiva Sahasranama Stotram
stotras.author: Various (Linga Purana, Shiva Purana)
stotras.summary: A hymn listing 1000 sacred names of Lord Shiva describing various attributes, forms, and powers.
stotras.benefits: Brings overall prosperity, spiritual upliftment, and divine favor.

stotras.name: Dakshinamurthy Stotram
stotras.author: Adi Shankaracharya
stotras.summary: Glorifies Shiva as the supreme teacher of wisdom and self-knowledge.
stotras.benefits: Enhances knowledge, intellect, and spiritual clarity.

stotras.name: Shiva Manasa Puja
stotras.author: Adi Shankaracharya
stotras.summary: A mental worship ritual where the devotee offers flowers, incense, and devotion through visualization.
stotras.benefits: Purifies mind, improves concentration, increases devotion.

stotras.name: Shiva Mahimna Stotram
stotras.author: Pushpadanta
stotras.summary: One of the greatest hymns praising the greatness, virtues, and universal presence of Shiva.
stotras.benefits: Removes obstacles, brings fame, virtue, and divine grace.

stotras.name: Shiva Aparadha Kshamapana Stotram
stotras.author: Adi Shankaracharya
stotras.summary: Prayer for forgiveness of mistakes committed knowingly or unknowingly.
stotras.benefits: Clears karmic burdens and brings peace.

stotras.name: Chandrasekhara Ashtakam
stotras.author: Adi Shankaracharya
stotras.summary: Praises Shiva who holds the crescent moon on his matted hair.
stotras.benefits: Removes fear, grants courage and spiritual protection.

stotras.name: Nataraja Stotram
stotras.author: Unknown
stotras.summary: Describes Shiva's cosmic dance that sustains creation and dissolution.
stotras.benefits: Inspires creativity, rhythm, and spiritual awakening.

stotras.name: Kalabhairava Ashtakam
stotras.author: Adi Shankaracharya
stotras.deity_form: Kala Bhairava (Guardian of time and Kashi)
stotras.summary: Praises Bhairava, the fierce protector of Dharma and ruler of time.
stotras.benefits: Destroys fear, grants time-management, protection, and success.
